@chloekaftan I found this one pretty realistic in some aspect too because it reminds me myself back then when I don't know "why" I was supposed to act like anyone said I should to opposite sex too, especially on page 55. Trying to find your "identity" when reaching adulthood is very confusing.

the last bit hit me harder than i expected. reaffirming an almost forgotten doubt i had on my relationship with my bf, he never implies it but i always thought i had to behave that way.. and having no hope of any courage to ask him otherwise.. i seriously didn't need this self doubt at 7am.. (no sleep)

Haruki was a boy but her body is a girl now due to some weird disease. She was treated as a handicapped as her "body" changed completely she even got female sexual organs inside and out. But since she's but a kid, her "mind" still have doubts about her identity from now on and she's trying to find it out by having relationships with this dude. It's as weird as Josei manga can gets but not hard to understand at all.

I think she's having identical crisis. She doesn't know about female at all because she lived as a boy and it's too sudden that she become a girl. Her thought process is like a boy that only know little about female. Anyway 10/10 great chapter looking forward for the next. Also don't listen to those bitchiest who's crying about gender bender this shit is great.

Her thought process could be part of the mental problems she said were common with TS or at least a contributing factor. And that pad at the end is a nice sign of things to come. Though since the are not using condoms she may not need it. A girl can get pregnant BEFORE the appearance of her first period. That'd be an interesting twist to this.

Pro tip ya dumbfucks, TS Shoujo Haruki Kun means Transexual Girl Haruki. 

Its about a dude establishing a sexual relationship with a child after a weird disease magically and instantly swaps them to a girl, so its more of a weird coming of age story than a trap thing. 

I don't know about about all that self insert josei manga nonsense. All I know is that Haruki is a lot more enjoyable character than most of these hentai and satisfies my need for more personality in my loli charactets.

Reading these comments, I recommended those who are confused to read article about the word "Josei manga". The one on wikipedia is good as well. This one is actually Josei manga with hentai scenes in it. TLDR : Josei manga was meant for woman readers to "self insert" as the female MC. BUT sometimes said female MC was too hot it attracted male readers as well. So that's why this series is so strange.

the artist clearly likes loli, (s)he can clearly draw loli, (s)he clearly is selling to an audience that primarily likes loli; that said, why can't the little girl loli in your loli comic be a loli, and not some contrived, weird, arcane, forced genderbent shota / little boy? why? like ..... WHY???? what do you get out of this?????? sure i can still finish to it sure, because i can ignore the text and look at the pictures or even look at the untranslated versions of this upload, but still the point stands doesn't it? more than anything i just ask why, and before anyone answers with "b-but people have really specific fetishes and ffhfhafkjakfapplplgbigbp02qqiu, so please understand that", i clearly know WHY why, but i still ask why? why go to the trouble of learning to draw little girls for your loli comic (a hard thing to learn to do) and then say, "okay it's actually a boy, lolol." what's even the point

It does not make you into that thing. Stop limiting your puny brains. Bunch of children.. Maybe you should have parental restrictions after all if you can't handle shit. godallmightee.... If I'm not mistaken, Dobato (the author) is female. That's why this h-manga is pretty much an overblown Josei manga (a manga for grown woman, mostly about questionable relationships with huge age gap). However, I really like it. Haruki is cute. She had changed so much since we first saw her as a gloomy girl who used to be a boy not long ago. I hope there'll be more after the next one though as her & sensei cute to look at somehow.
